chapter_description.p: The Python Engine in Nelson provides seamless integration with Python, enabling users to combine the strengths of both environments.
This chapter introduces the available functions for running Python code, managing interpreter environments, and handling data exchange between Nelson and Python.

keyword.name: The power of calling Python from Nelson
Python Nelson types
keyword.description: Managing Data between Python and Nelson.

keyword.name: Python operators
keyword.description: The representation of Python operators in Nelson.

keyword.name: pyargs
keyword.description: Change default environment of Python interpreter.

keyword.name: pyenv
keyword.description: Change default environment of Python interpreter.
